courses.name: Linear Algebra and Geometry
courses.instructor: Jeremy Macdonald, Romain Branchereau, Miguel Ayala, Antoine Giard

assessments.title: Assignments released every Friday, Sunday. Multiple attempts allowed
assessments.description: Assignments released every Friday, due Sunday.  Multiple attempts allowed.

textbooks: Linear Algebra with Applications by W. K. Nicholson - Not specified
otherInfo: Two grading schemes are available; the higher grade will be used.  Scheme 1 includes a midterm (20%), Webwork assignments (15%), and a final exam (65%). Scheme 2 includes Webwork assignments (15%) and a final exam (85%). Letter grades are assigned based on a provided interval table; boundaries may be lowered at instructorsâ€™ discretion. Students are responsible for being aware of all assignment due dates. Requests for brief extensions will be considered. Collaboration on assignments is allowed, but outside help in solving problems is prohibited.  Course information and announcements will be posted on myCourses.  Use the Ed discussion forum for questions, not email.  Several resources for help are available including office hours, tutorials, a discussion forum, the Burnside Math Helpdesk, and SciLearn Peer Collaboration.  Students may submit written work in English or French. Legally mandated accommodations are handled by Student Accessibility and Achievement. The course content and/or evaluation scheme may change due to extraordinary circumstances.
